sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import {Link} from 'react-router-dom' import './PopularMenu.sass' import {Button, Title} from '../../../components' function PopularMenu({menuDishes}) { return (
<div className="menu__categories"> { menuDishes.slice(0, 4).map( (elem, index) => { return <div className="menu__category" key={index}> <div className="menu__category-title">{elem.title}</div> <div className="menu__category-items"> {elem.dishes.filter( (elem) => elem.type === 'popular').map( (elem, index) => { return <div className="menu__category-item" key={index}> <div className="menu__category-item-info"> <div className="menu__category-item-name">{elem.name}</div> <div className="menu__category-item-price">{elem.price}₴</div> </div> <div className="menu__category-item-description">{elem.description}</div> </div> })} </div> </div> }) } </div> <Link to="/dishes"> <Button className="menu__button button__solid" light>перейти до повного меню</Button> </Link> </div> </div> ) } export default PopularMenu
